official_title: A bill to amend section 402 of title 23, United States Code, relating to the establishment by each State of a program to require the mandatory suspension of persons convicted of driving while under the influence of alcohol as a part of its highway safety program.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Transportation from approving any State highway safety program that does not require the suspension of driving privileges of persons convicted of driving while under the influence of alcohol.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 402 of title 23, United States Code, relating to the establishment by each State of a program to require the mandatory suspension of persons convicted of driving while under the influence of alcohol as a part of its highway safety program.
